targets.rawSql:
/* NODES */
SELECT 
  'ORG_' || li.id as id,
  li.name_text as title,
  'circle' as shape,
  'Organisation' as "subTitle",
  CASE WHEN li.legal_form_text ILIKE '%e.V.%' THEN 'blue' ELSE 'green' END as color
FROM lobbyist_identity li
WHERE li.recent_gov_function_present = true
LIMIT 100

UNION ALL

SELECT DISTINCT
  'GOV_' || rgf.id as id,
  COALESCE(cl.de, 'Regierungsamt') as title,
  'triangle' as shape,
  'Behörde / Amt' as "subTitle",
  'red' as color
FROM recent_government_function rgf
LEFT JOIN code_label cl ON rgf.type_label_id = cl.id
WHERE rgf.id IN (SELECT recent_gov_function_id FROM lobbyist_identity WHERE recent_gov_function_present = true)
   OR rgf.id IN (SELECT recent_gov_function_id FROM entrusted_person WHERE recent_gov_function_present = true)

SELECT
  'ORG_' || li.id AS "from",
  'GOV_' || li.recent_gov_function_id AS "to"
FROM lobbyist_identity li
WHERE li.recent_gov_function_present = true AND li.recent_gov_function_id IS NOT NULL

UNION ALL

SELECT
  'ORG_' || ep.identity_id AS "from",
  'GOV_' || ep.recent_gov_function_id AS "to"
FROM entrusted_person ep
WHERE ep.recent_gov_function_present = true AND ep.recent_gov_function_id IS NOT NULL

panels.title: Drehtür-Netzwerk (Wer kennt wen aus der Regierung?)
